inclusion.criterion: Affected by STEC-HUS defined by Thrombocytopenia (<150 000/mm3)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Mechanic hemolytic anemia (Hemoglobin < 10g/dL, haptoglobin <LLN, lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) >upper limit of normal (ULN) and/or bilirubin > ULN, presence of schizocytes)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ARF defined by an estimated Schwartz 2009 creatinin clearance <75ml/min/1,73m²
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: With prodromal diarrhea and/or presence of an enterohemorrhagic strain of Escherichia Coli and/or identification of the Stx 1 or 2 genes in the stool sample or rectal swab
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Female patients of childbearing potential must be practicing an effective, reliable and medically acceptable contraceptive regimen during the entire duration of the study and 5 months after the end of the participation.
inclusion.label: unknown
